channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: MAGA media wages asymmetric warfare on antifa
item.description: MAGA media is flexing its ability to shape the debate over antifa and violent crime in American cities, empowered by allies in the White House hungry ...

item.title: Trump promised not to let Israel break Gaza ceasefire to get deal
item.description: As negotiations for a Gaza peace deal approached the finish line, President Trump provided a personal guarantee he wouldn't let Israel abandon it and ...

item.title: Trump did not win 2025 Nobel Peace Prize
item.description: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado won the Nobel Peace Prize Friday, sidelining President Trump who has openly campaigned for the honor...

item.title: RFK Jr.'s next vaccine target
item.description: The CDC's vaccine advisory committee this week announced the creation of a working group to review the childhood vaccination schedule, including the t...

item.title: Apple will pay up to $2M for finding an iPhone security flaw
item.description: Apple is increasing how much it pays to security researchers for the bugs they find in iPhones and Macs, with some payouts topping $2 million. Why it ...

item.title: Judge blocks Trump from deploying troops in Illinois for now
item.description: Officials in Oregon and Illinois had challenged the Trump administration’s push to dispatch the National Guard in both states.

item.title: John Thune’s shutdown strategy: Wait for the Democrats to fold
item.description: Thune hopes Democrats will soon, under pressure, vote to reopen the government: “It’s up to them.”

item.title: Trump’s ‘maximum pressure’ on Israel won Gaza ceasefire, White House says
item.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday credited several Middle Eastern and global leaders for helping secure the first phase of a deal in hopes of ending ...

item.title: Senate passes $925 billion defense bill, setting up House talks
item.description: Staff from both chambers must now negotiate final, compromise legislation ahead of a vote expected later this fall.

item.title: White House declines to engage Democrats as shutdown drags into second week
item.description: The White House has yet to engage Democrats on ending the government shutdown, despite the potential political ramifications of the closure.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
